title: Looking to Buy T215-1 Red Cross Type 1

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy T215-1 Red Cross Type 1
posts.post_content: Please send me pics and prices. Thanks! Chris.

I have a Jennings for sale on my web-site:

[url]http://t206themonster.com/Page-MiscCards.html[/url]
Thanks Scott, but I am just looking for a nice, low-grade example for my collection. Not ready for a mide-grade hof'er. (Nice card though).
